alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 5:05AM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow developing early this afternoon will become heavy at times tonight through Saturday. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 18 inches, greatest to the west of Munising. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Alger, Luce and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions are possible at times tonight into Saturday morning, especially to the west of Munising.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
